description: Ingredients: 1 cup dried chickpeas | 1/2 cup onion, chopped | 1 cup parsley | 1 small green chile pepper, serrano or jalapeno pepper | 3 garlic cloves | 1 tsp cumin | 1 tsp salt | 1/2 tsp cardamom | 1/4 tsp black pepper | 2 tbsp chickpea flour | 1/2 tsp baking soda | avocado oil for frying
name: Falafel

description: Ingredients: Lettuce | Cucumber | Tomatoes | Bell pepper | Kalamata olives | Pepperoncini | Garbanzo beans | Feta cheese | Za’atar Lemon vinaigrette
name: Greek Salad

description: Ingredients: 1/4 cup (60ml) Extra virgin olive oil |1 Onion, finely chopped | 4 Garlic cloves, thinly sliced | 3/4 cup (210g) Tomato paste | 1/2 cup (125ml) Vodka | 1/4 cup (60ml) Thickened cream |1/2 cup (40g) Finely grated parmesan | 400g Rigatoni, cooked to packet instructions | 1/4 cup (60ml) Cooking water reserved
name: Tomato Vodka Rigatoni

description: Ingredients: 1 cup Dried Chickpeas | 1 cup Maitake mushrooms | 1/2 cup Chopped onions | 1 Tbs onion &garlic powder | 1/2 Tbs salt & black pepper | 1tsp Cumin | 1tsp Old Bay | 1tsp Paprika | 1/2 tsp coriander
name: Veggie Burgers

description: Ingredients: Brown Rice | Broccoli | Kale | Spinach | Carrots | Maitake mushroooms | Onions | Choice of Sauce
name: Vegetable Stir Fry

description: Ingredients: 1 glass ready cherry tomatoes, or 2-3 ready plum tomatoes, coarsely slashed | 2 Tbsp of your choice of onions | 1 medium clove of garlic | 1 little jalapeño | 1 Tbsp olive oil | 1/4 glass crisp cilantro | lime juice | squeeze of salt | add your choice of poblano, chipotle, red ringer pepper, pineapple or mango
name: Fresh Tasty Salsa

description: Ingredients: 1 cup grain rice | 1 can chickpeas | 4-5 diced portobello mushrooms | cilantro or parsley | 1/2 cup of hot sauce | 1/4 cup balsalmic vinaigrette
name: Sauteed Chickpeas and Rice

description: Ingredients: 1 bunch of baby carrots | 2 handfuls of Green Beans top and tailed | 1 large Onion cut into 8 wedges | 15 fresh Cherry Tomatoes halved | 3 sprigs Thyme | 1tsp Dried Onion flakes | 1tsp Dried Sage leaves | 1/2 tsp coarse Celtic sea salt or to taste | 1/8 tsp Black Pepper | 1/4 tsp chili flakes |200ml Vegetable Broth | 1tsp Tamari or soy sauce
name: Roasted Garden Vegetables

description: 6-8 medium Yukon gold potatoes (if large, cut in half) | 1 tsp Sea Salt (divided) | Water to cover | 1/2 tsp Sea Salt | 1/2 tsp Ground Black Pepper | 5-6 cloves raw or roasted Garlic (or sub minced garlic sautéed for 3 minutes in olive oil) | 3-4 Tbsp Vegan Butter (such as Earth Balance // melted/softened) | 1/4 cup Fresh Chives (for topping, optional)
name: Vegan Garlic Mashed Potatoes
